Comment:
I am playing hiredgun112 at the moment - I am oodle3: I would just like to annotate this game. 

This is standard.
I would have preferred 4. Nc3 or 4. e3 but 4. O-O is perfectly fine.
?? Obvious Nxh4 for white, winning the queen. I would have played Nc6 or e6.
e3, as suggested - but in this case, playing Nxh4 is the best.
Pinning the knight, but I prefer the bishop where it is.
Giving black isolated and doubled pawns.
a4? I see not why this move was played. If I were white, I would play Bg5, perhaps.
a4? I see not why this move was played. If I were white, I would play Bg5, perhaps.
